name: Arsatum: Random RPG Project
description:
Arsatum: Random RPG Project is an RPG where your goal is to save Arsatum from the evil invasion of gnoblins. In the game, you can endlessly kill gnoblins and upgrade your character. The world of Arsatum is randomly generated. The game has many different locations that you can explore. The cities in the game generate different merchants that you can interact with.

To complete the game you need to collect 10 demonic keys. Demonic keys will help you close the gnoblin portal.

Hope you like the game!
